sentences.en: Every care has been taken in compiling this list.
sentences.cn: 汇编这份清单时考虑得很充分。

sentences.en: Every child will receive a certificate at the end of the course.
sentences.cn: 课程结束时，每一个孩子都可以获得证书。

sentences.en: Every line etched on her face told a story of personal anguish.
sentences.cn: 她脸上的每条皱纹都讲述了一次痛苦的经历。

sentences.en: Every person stood to applaud his unforgettable act of courage.
sentences.cn: 所有人起立为他不可磨灭的英勇之举鼓掌。

sentences.en: He is every bit as mean as she is.
sentences.cn: 他完全与她同样平庸

sentences.en: His every utterance will be scrutinized.
sentences.cn: 他说的每句话都会被细查。

sentences.en: I enjoyed every minute of the film.
sentences.cn: 那部电影我从头到尾都看得很过瘾。

sentences.en: I listened carefully to every word he said.
sentences.cn: 他说的每一个字我都听得很仔细。

sentences.en: I used to see him every now and then.
sentences.cn: 我以前不时地去看他。

sentences.en: I wear my old shoes every day. One sole has come unglued.
sentences.cn: 我每天都穿那双旧鞋，有一只鞋底已经脱胶了。

sentences.en: In every one of her pictures she conveys a sense of immediacy.
sentences.cn: 她拍的每一张照片中都传递出一种临场感，使人有如亲临现场。

sentences.en: it brews a perfect blend of coffee every time.
sentences.cn: 用它煮出的咖啡每次浑然一绝。

sentences.en: More than six million youngsters tune in to Blockbusters every day.
sentences.cn: 每天有600多万年轻人收看“热门大片”这档节目。

sentences.en: Naomi used to go to church in Granville every Sunday.
sentences.cn: 娜奥米以前每个星期天都去格兰维尔的教堂做礼拜。

sentences.en: She knows every student in the school.
sentences.cn: 她认识学校里的每一个学生。

sentences.en: She went to visit her aunt every other week.
sentences.cn: 她每隔一星期去看一次姑妈

sentences.en: Someone comes in every day to check all is in order.
sentences.cn: 每天都有人来检查是否一切都井然有序。

sentences.en: The buses go every 10 minutes.
sentences.cn: 公共汽车每隔10分钟发一班车。

sentences.en: The directors of this company feel he's worth every penny.
sentences.cn: 这家公司的主管们觉得他值得栽培。

sentences.en: the planning should be every bit as enjoyable as the event itself.
sentences.cn: 策划应该和活动本身一样有趣。

sentences.en: the planning should be every bit as enjoyable as the event itself.
sentences.cn: 策划应该和活动本身一样有趣。

sentences.en: They call rowing the perfect sport. It exercises every major muscle group.
sentences.cn: 他们称划船是最佳运动，它可以锻炼每一处主要肌肉群。

sentences.en: They have a tendency to show off, to dramatize almost every situation.
sentences.cn: 他们爱炫耀，几乎对每种情况都添油加醋。

sentences.en: they insist you weigh every single thing.
sentences.cn: 他们坚持要你们对每一件事仔细考虑。

sentences.en: This is happening in every school throughout the country.
sentences.cn: 全国各地每所学校都在发生这样的事情。

sentences.en: unbelievers, every last one of them.
sentences.cn: 凡不信教者。

sentences.en: We are prepared to fight for every inch of territory.
sentences.cn: 我们时刻准备着为每一寸领土而战。

sentences.en: We looked carefully at every car that drove past.
sentences.cn: 我们仔细地看着驶过的每一辆汽车。

sentences.en: you can see cracks moving every which way.
sentences.cn: 你会看见到处都在裂缝。

sentences.en: You don't have to go running upstairs every time she rings.
sentences.cn: 用不着她一来电话你就往楼上跑。

sentences.en: You're quite a party animal aren't you, out there every night.
sentences.cn: 你就是为派对而生的，不是吗，每天晚上你都去参加派对。

phrases.tran_cn: 在各方面，完全地；同样地
［用于加强语气］每一个；全部；无一例外
(谚)人各有其价（指任何人都是可以收买的）

phrases.phrase: every now and again (或 now and then)
every now and then 或 every now and again

phrases.tran_cn: 杂乱无章地，全无秩序地

trans.tran_en: used with singular nouns to refer to all the members of a group of things or people
used to refer to all the people or things in a particular group or all the parts of something
